ValidationRule.description: Prevent users from setting the case status to Waiting for transfer manually
ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: OR( AND( InApproval__c = False, OR(ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Waiting for Transfer'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Waiting for Control'), ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Waiting for Approval')) ), AND ( InApproval__c = True, ISPICKVAL(Status, 'Waiting for Transfer'), $User.Id <> OwnerId ))
ValidationRule.errorMessage: You cannot set the case to this status manually
